GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
net: bcmgenet: Use stronger register read/writes to assure ordering

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 06d836801cd82ded282aaf9e888ff9e7e4a88b91, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit 69d2ea9c798983c4a7157278ec84ff969d1cd8e8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: bcmgenet: Use stronger register read/writes to assure ordering
